review: I'm happy that they made the fire stick. I was tired of watching Netflix on my 22" monitor or my Iphone.Now I can see all the movies/sitcoms/documentaries etc for less than 5% of what cable companiescharge consumers monthly.  The reason It did not receive 5 stars was the fact that just about everyother day it has to be rebooted because it loses internet connect. It is only 4 feet from my high speedwireless modem. Then you have to disconnect the cable from the Fire stick for 3 seconds to reboot it.Other than that it is worth the $39.99
